text:
May I suggest you to remove previous Tomcat 4 :

rpm -e tomcat4 tomcat4-webapps tomcat4-admin-webapps then 
erase tomcat4 directory (rm -rf /var/tomcat4) and make a clean install ?
creator: hgomez@apache.org
